author: Dragos Cirjan <dragos.cirjan@gmail.com>
title: Low level design VSCode Extensions
description:
Low level design VSCode Extensions - This project is a VSCode/VSCodium extension pack builder gone wrong. The design is wrong, the implementation is wrong, the publish scripts work only when they want to. Please write a LLD for a tool that packs vscode(ium) extensions. You should cover:
- configuration for each extension pack
  - what other extensions to contain
  - what snipets, custom settings, key bindigings to contain
  - documentation for what the extension does
  - (if possible) MCP server configuration (especially if the extension is for a language server)
  - configuration files - you are free too chose but should be comprehensible - can even be a set of multiple tools/languages (JSON, TOML, YAML, Markdown, TypeScript) for better readability of the content
